thread.title: Amazing view over the city. Pefect for romantic city break
thread.title_full: Amazing view over the city. Pefect for romantic city break - Review of Terrass'' Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jam551
title: Amazing view over the city. Pefect for romantic city break
text:
We always wander up to Montmartre so wanted a hotel close to the hill without being in the main tourist traps. The Terrass'' is a perfect boutique hotel. Our rooms was very chic with a huge power shower and a balcony with great views to the Eiffel Tower.
There is a great cocktail bar on site and the restaurant offers great views.
We did not have breakfast in the hotel as there are a number of fabulous cafes literally round the corner, which offer breakfast for 7 euros.
A great place to stay in Paris.
Room Tip: The corner rooms have juliet balconies which overlook the city See more room tips
